changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS question_likes ( user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, rate_id BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, rate_id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id), FOREIGN KEY (rate_id) REFERENCES rate(id) )

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO question_likes VALUES (1, 1), (2, 1), (3, 1) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
